title: Maintenance work on Punggol LRT system

title_translations.zh-Hans: 榜鹅轻轨系统维修工作
title_translations.ms: Kerja penyelenggaraan di sistem LRT Punggol

updates.text:
We will be conducting maintenance work on the Punggol LRT system this Sunday, 8 July 2018. 

Train service will be available as usual at all stations, but only in one direction. Service in the opposite direction will start at 5.30pm. https://t.co/YOh88JqLTr
